PreceptDef.label: indifferent
PreceptDef.description:
Nutrient paste is a necessity on the Rim. It may not be tasty but it keeps you well fed for another day.

<color=#E5E54C>Note:</color>
 - This is just a version of the "Don't mind" rank of the precept that doesn't need Transhumanist, so you can add it to other ideos if you want.

PreceptDef.label: preferred
PreceptDef.description: Nutrient paste is divine ambrosia. A formless glop made of reprocessed meats, vegetables and... "other things". Who could say no to that?

li.label: ate nutrient paste meal
li.description: I ate a delicious nutrient paste meal of unknown composition. The wonders of modern technology!
